mapper.select: select b.id from maoding_web_company_user a inner join maoding_web_account b on (a.user_id=b.id) inner join maoding_web_company h on (a.company_id=h.id) left join maoding_web_business_partner i on (h.id=i.company_id) left join maoding_web_org_auth j on ((j.deleted is null or j.deleted=0) and h.id=j.id) where (b.status is null or b.status='0') and (h.status is null or h.status='0') and (a.user_name=#{userName} or b.user_name=#{userName}) and (h.company_name=#{companyName} or h.company_short_name=#{companyName} or i.nick_name=#{companyName} or j.org_name=#{companyName}) limit 1

select distinct account.*,member_list.company_user_id from maoding_web_account account
inner join maoding_web_member_list member_list on (member_list.deleted = 0 and member_list.account_id = account.id) inner join maoding_web_project_task task on ( task.task_status = '0' and (member_list.node_id = task.id or member_list.target_id = task.id) and task.id = #{parentTaskId} ) inner join maoding_web_project_task sub_task on ( task.task_status = '0' and position(task.task_path in sub_task.task_path) > 0 )
where account.status = '0'
